wikipedia_page.main: Matt Butcher (born 5 August 1983 in Birmingham, England) is an English folk, Americana, country, independent recording artist from Orlando, Florida. Butcher, former lead singer of Orlando's The Heathens, recorded his first solo album during the summer of 2008. Entitled Me and My Friends, the album was released independently in the fall of 2008 and was voted one of the ten best of that year in the Orlando Sentinel.

link_mentions.page: Matt Butcher Me and My Friends
response: Me and My Friends is a 2008 album by Matt Butcher, accompanied by "The Revolvers". The album received overwhelmingly positive reviews, including commentaries from the Orlando Weekly, The Daily Times and KillerPop.

After disbanding in 2006, Matt Butcher and Chris Rae continued with The Heathens until 2007.  Matt Butcher then followed with The Revolvers which later fused into his own solo career.  To date, he has released two critically acclaimed solo albums.
